My Expertise

David is a 2017 graduate of Dev Bootcamp in New York City, where he was immersered in FullStack Development. Before Dev, David gained invaluable customer service skills and technical insights while working directly with customers at various SaaS companies. David holds a bachlors degree in Political Science from College of Charleston.
